name: The Water Trees
description:
The Water Trees is a photographic image processed in multiple techniques. This is one of my most popular pieces. When printed on metallic paper or brushed aluminum, this print takes on so many shades of Indigo. I still find this piece so tranquil. The subtle waves in the water soothe and calm.

I am always asked why I like to hang this piece on its side, and I always reply "I like an asymmetrical world... it just feels right to me." This piece can be displayed vertically or horizontally and still maintain compositional balance.

Thank you for your visit!
Malia

options.name: 9 x 12 open-edition print on metallic paper (not signed)
